Last week, I was interviewed on the program [Breitband](https://www.deutschlandfunkkultur.de/tracking-am-handgelenk-was-passiert-mit-den-daten-aus-unseren-wearables-100.html) on Deutschlandfunk Kultur about the ruling of a Belgian court against four shadow libraries, as well as the Open Library of the Internet Archive (Krempl, 2025). The broadcast is now available [online](https://www.deutschlandfunkkultur.de/tracking-am-handgelenk-was-passiert-mit-den-daten-aus-unseren-wearables-100.html). Enjoy listening!

![](interview-on-deutschlandfunk-kultur.jpg)
